testimonials.name: Sarah M.
testimonials.text: Our AC went out on a Friday evening during a 110-degree weekend. Desert Aire had a technician at our house within two hours and fixed it the same night. Incredible service!

testimonials.name: Michael R.
testimonials.text: Had a new high-efficiency system installed. The team was professional, cleaned up after themselves, and took time to explain how everything works. Our energy bills are noticeably lower now.

testimonials.name: Jennifer L.
testimonials.text: Been using Desert Aire for annual maintenance for three years now. They're always on time, thorough, and honest. Wouldn't trust anyone else with our HVAC system.

testimonials.name: David K.
testimonials.text: After getting quotes from five companies for a new system, Desert Aire offered the best value and didn't try to oversell us. The installation was flawless.

testimonials.name: Patricia H.
testimonials.text: The technician diagnosed a problem that two other companies missed. Honest, knowledgeable, and fixed it right the first time. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Robert T.
testimonials.text: Had our ducts cleaned and the difference in air quality is amazing. The team showed us before and after photos - couldn't believe how dirty they were. Great service!

testimonials.name: Maria G.
testimonials.text: Emergency call on a Sunday morning and they were here within an hour. Fair price for emergency service and got our AC running again. Lifesavers!

testimonials.name: James W.
testimonials.text: Installed a whole-house air purifier and new filtration system. My allergies have improved significantly. The installation team was courteous and efficient.
